ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 354
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, That s a minus.  It s not that you can have it equipped, in fact, you MUST have it equipped.  It won t fire from an inventory slot :(    I prefer
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, That's a minus. It's not that you can have it equipped, in fact,
you MUST have it equipped. It won't fire from an inventory slot :( I
prefer being able to move the telescope out of a bag and firing it from the
inventory for as long as I need it, as opposed to having to give up my
Incandescent Mask whenever I want to use an Eyepatch. btw, The level
restriction on the eyepatch is 10.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Terris-Thule)



At 05:58 AM 2/8/01 , you wrote:
> > >
> > >Eyepatches are a joke. Use spyglasses.
> > >
>
>There is one advance on the eyepatch, and that is that
>you can have it equipped and put it on a hotbutton.
>Makes using it easier. Most people can't afford the
>luxury to have a main inventory slot set up like this
>with the telescope.
>
>Still, the level restriction is a big joke.
>
>Piip Ignatz
>Innoruuk
>
